award-group.funding-source: Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey

funding-group.funding-statement: Hadia Syahirah Abd Raman, as a graduate student, was largely supported by scholarships provided by Ministry of Higher Education, Malaysia through its MyBrain15 initiative, and Perdana University, Malaysia. Perdana University also provided the publication payment and the computational resources/services for the work. Asif M. Khan was supported by Perdana University, Malaysia, Bezmialem Vakif University, Turkey and The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey, under the 2232â€”International Fellowship for Outstanding Researchers programme. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
